title: Speed of ball just before landing

content.prompt: A ball is thrown with an initial speed of 20 m/s at an angle of 60° to the ground. If air resistance is negligible, what is the ball’s speed at the instant it reaches its maximum height from the ground?

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
